main event: On April 15, 1957 in Northern California, a metallic, circular UFO, approximately 50 feet in diameter, was observed by multiple witnesses. The UFO appeared to hover at an estimated altitude of 500 to 1000 feet before suddenly accelerating and disappearing from view.
interesting points: The UFO was observed for approximately 30 minutes by Mr. Thomas P. Anderson and for 15-20 minutes by other witnesses, including a USAF officer stationed at a local air force base.
No lights or sounds were observed coming from the metallic UFO.
Despite multiple witness accounts, no definitive information on the nature or origin of the UFO was obtained.
The investigation was ongoing as of the report date.
The evaluation of the UFO sighting did not fit any kind of hostile propagation and was unable to give a definite answer, possibly indicating anomalous propagation.
sighted object: metallic, circular UFO approximately 50 feet in diameter
